entities.name: Percy
entities.description: Percy is introduced as someone who spluttered into silence when he ran into most of his family. He is described as having not expected to run into them.

entities.name: Fleur
entities.description: Fleur is introduced as someone who tries to break the tension by asking about Teddy. She is described as making a 'wildly transparent attempt' to do so.

entities.name: Lupin
entities.description: Lupin is introduced as someone who responds to Fleur's question and tries to break the tension. He is described as being startled by her question.

entities.name: Teddy
entities.description: Teddy is mentioned as Lupin's child, who is with Tonks at her mother's place.

entities.name: Tonks
entities.description: Tonks is introduced as someone who is taking care of Teddy. She is described as being at her mother's place.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who sees the photograph of Teddy with Tonks.

entities.name: Severus Snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned in the context of 'The Sacking of Severus Snape', which suggests that something has happened to him.

relationships.description: Percy and Fleur encounter each other when Percy runs into most of his family.
Lupin is the parent of Teddy, who is with Tonks at her mother's place.
Fleur and Harry share an experience when they see the photograph of Teddy with Tonks.
Lupin is in a relationship with Tonks, who is taking care of Teddy.
Percy is a member of the Weasley family.
